color="#ff0000">网络互通</font></b></span>" style="shape=note;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;size=20;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> Headless Service无头服务
Eureka Server
